bio: This Yo-kai is- wait... that's not a Yo-kai, it's just a guy! They really let anyone apply for this thing nowadays huh...

soultimate.name: Fountain of Youth
soultimate.description: Allies recover a lot of HP; fainted allies are revived.

skill.effect: Increases revival speed by 200% but revives at 1 HP.
skill.name: Percyverance

name: Percy Vere
